contents.aboutMe: Hello! I'm Jessica Prieto. I am a Web Enthusiast and a Front-End Developer. I really enjoy designing websites and as well as writing code to bring them to life.

A.name: Web Dev
A.description: I enjoy designing and developing web UI/UX. Aside from front-end, I also like exploring back-end dev and create more functionality to a site.

B.name: Mobile Dev
B.description: I also enjoy developing the design and full functionality of mobile apps particularly for android.

C.name: Hobbies
C.description: Being active is something I really enjoy doing. Easy to say, I love being outdoors!
